channel.title: Comments for page "Apocalypse Calendar"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Apocalypse Calendar"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
If the Calendear made it every 7 days instead of every 14 days, that would be 100% faster. It's only 50% faster, so it's full Vacation every 10.5 days.

EDIT: Math Failure. Calendar makes 16 Hours = 1 Day, so you get a full Vacation in 14x that, or 9 Days, 8 Hours.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So what does it mean by vacation time accumulates 50% faster? I can confirm that it doesn't mean that you get the large 111/166 stamina bonus every 7 days instead of 14, as I have 7 days currently, and only 52 stamina for a vacation (35, plus 17 for neo-monster island)â€¦ Any info is greatly appreciated, thanks!
